DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, single-center study to examine distinguishing features of the structure and function of the oral and gut microbiome in healthy adult normal volunteers compared to volunteers with PH-HFpEF in the breakdown of oral nitrate.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Oral Nitrate in Adults With Pulmonary Hypertension With Heart Failure and Preserved Ejection Fraction
DOC.criteria: Undergoing clinical right heart catheterization or RHC in the past 6 months.
